subject: Re: Calm thyself-again and again and again.....
author: Not given
full_text:
Just a fwiw.. 3 tropical systems developed on the 15th with the one looking to take a course along the east coast.


Just do what works best for you Frank you've been doing it long enough now you should know what that is.


Shane


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  Well, it seems the original prediction of the east coast getting clobbered
> is probably correct. Where I fell down was trying to ask questions and
> getting BS doomsville junk. I knew it's a mistake to ask questions, that
> like opens the door for the dark dorks. I'm going back to just announcing
> I'm doing an EVP recording, and just record. They know what I'm thinking and
> what I need to know and who I would like to hear from. Asking questions, at
> least for me, has always lead to problems. I'm not like others, presumming
> I'm so smart and know what is talking, and if it's honest, like most of the
> box experts out there on the web. You know, the ones doing pod casts, radio
> shows and proclaiming this that and the other thing.
> 
> 
> 
>  Frank-S
>
